svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 30 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 30, 2024" date: "2024-11-29"
Eth News and Links
Tornado Cash contracts canâ€™t be sanctioned under current law, blob increase included in Pectra upgrade
and Ethereum protocol attackathon
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #146): Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : consensus layer
client teams fixing deposit processing bug Blobs: Agreed to increase blobs per block target to 6 & max
of 9 and change update fraction via EIP7691 Long range syncing , clients not purely bottlenecked by
bandwidth Block arrival & home staker analysis supports increase to 4/8 or 6/9 (target/max) Blob fee
market discussion EIP7623 (increase calldata cost): inclusion in Pectra to be decided at execution
layer call (ACDE) next week Pectra-devnet-5 spec : agreed to exclude empty requests in Engine API to
mirror EIP7685 & consolidation processing fix in EIP7251 EIP7805 Fork-choice enforced Inclusion Lists
(FOCIL) presentation All Core Devs process improvements
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Mekong testnet : consensus layer client teams fixing deposit processing bug Blobs:
Agreed to increase blobs per block target to 6 & max of 9 and change update fraction via EIP7691 Long
range syncing , clients not purely bottlenecked by bandwidth Block arrival & home staker analysis
supports increase to 4/8 or 6/9 (target/max) Blob fee market discussion EIP7623 (increase calldata
cost): inclusion in Pectra to be decided at execution layer call (ACDE) next week Pectra-devnet-5 spec
: agreed to exclude empty requests in Engine API to mirror EIP7685 & consolidation processing fix in
EIP7251
Pectra upgrade:
â€¢ Mekong testnet : consensus layer client teams fixing deposit processing bug
Mekong testnet : consensus layer client teams fixing deposit processing bug

EIP7691 Long range syncing , clients not purely bottlenecked by bandwidth Block arrival & home staker
analysis supports increase to 4/8 or 6/9 (target/max) Blob fee market discussion EIP7623 (increase
calldata cost): inclusion in Pectra to be decided at execution layer call (ACDE) next week

â€¢ Agreed to increase blobs per block target to 6 & max of 9 and change update fraction via EIP7691
Long range syncing , clients not purely bottlenecked by bandwidth Block arrival & home staker analysis
supports increase to 4/8 or 6/9 (target/max)

Long range syncing , clients not purely bottlenecked by bandwidth

next week

â€¢ Pectra-devnet-5 spec : agreed to exclude empty requests in Engine API to mirror EIP7685 &
consolidation processing fix in EIP7251
Pectra-devnet-5 spec : agreed to exclude empty requests in Engine API to mirror EIP7685 &
â€¢ EIP7805 Fork-choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL) presentation
EIP7805 Fork-choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL) presentation
â€¢ All Core Devs process improvements
All Core Devs process improvements
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #12 : spec discussions on decoupling subnets and validator custody
PeerDAS breakout #12 : spec discussions on decoupling subnets and validator custody
â€¢ EOF implementers call #62 : discussions on compiler metadata and EOFCREATE hash
EOF implementers call #62 : discussions on compiler metadata and EOFCREATE hash
Layer 1
â€¢ QUIC support : ~42% of nodes, majority running Lighthouse & mostly over IPv4
QUIC support : ~42% of nodes, majority running Lighthouse & mostly over IPv4
â€¢ BuilderNet : block building network running on TEEs, shares MEV with users, early version live
operated by Flashbots, Beaverbuild & Nethermind
BuilderNet : block building network running on TEEs, shares MEV with users, early version live
â€¢ Terence: same slot vs next slot for inclusion list design, spec & prototype will use same slot
Terence: same slot vs next slot for inclusion list design, spec & prototype will use same slot
For stakers
â€¢ Deposit tools vulnerability : multiple keystore files generated in a single run should be considered
as unencrypted
Research
â€¢ In-protocol transaction ordering , extension to Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL)
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate
based on 74% self reported data) Consensus layer: Prysm 35% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
Execution layer: Geth ~43% & Nethermind ~36% (estimate based on 74% self reported data)
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
Consensus layer: Prysm 35%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.23.1 : fixes for issues in recent devnets
â€¢ Lodestar v1.23.1 : fixes for issues in recent devnets
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7825 : Transaction gas limit cap
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7825 : Transaction gas limit cap
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7826 : Quantum supremacy bounty ERC7827 : JSON contract with value
version control ERC7828 : Chain-specific addresses using ENS ERC7829 : Data asset NFT
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7826 : Quantum supremacy bounty
ERC7826 : Quantum supremacy bounty
â€¢ ERC7827 : JSON contract with value version control
ERC7827 : JSON contract with value version control
â€¢ ERC7828 : Chain-specific addresses using ENS
ERC7828 : Chain-specific addresses using ENS
â€¢ ERC7829 : Data asset NFT
ERC7829 : Data asset NFT
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry compiler profiles : compile contracts needing optimization with IR & tests without IR; 10x
compile time reduction for Uniswap v4 contracts
Foundry compiler profiles : compile contracts needing optimization with IR & tests without IR; 10x
â€¢ Echidna trace parser : convert Echidna call traces into Foundry tests
Echidna trace parser : convert Echidna call traces into Foundry tests
â€¢ Uniswap Compact (Solidity): ownerless ERC6909 contract, facilitates formation/dissolution of
reusable resource locks
Uniswap Compact (Solidity): ownerless ERC6909 contract, facilitates formation/dissolution of reusable
resource locks
â€¢ MicroStable : simple stablecoin design in Solidity & Vyper
MicroStable : simple stablecoin design in Solidity & Vyper
â€¢ Cyfrin Upgrade beginner & intermediate Python & Vyper courses
Cyfrin Upgrade beginner & intermediate Python & Vyper courses
â€¢ CTFs: OSAKA : EVM Object Format (EOF) challenge
CTFs:
â€¢ OSAKA : EVM Object Format (EOF) challenge
â€¢ Drift : write cached contract calls for web3 libraries (viem, web3.js & ethers)
Drift : write cached contract calls for web3 libraries (viem, web3.js & ethers)
Security
â€¢ Ethereum protocol attackathon : $1.5M reward pool, January 20 deadline
Job Listings
â€¢ Nethermind: AI Agent , Infra , Blockchain , Full Stack , BizDev & Researcher
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 4.0 to 46.4 gwei, 11.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2
gwei 9.5k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 4.0 to 46.4 gwei, 11.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
Gas: 4.0 to 46.4 gwei, 11.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
â€¢ 9.5k ETH net issuance this week
9.5k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $3,288 - $3,666, currently $3,598, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,288 - $3,666, currently $3,598, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Dan Finlay: meme token experiment , tools & incentives not currently sufficient for fundraising or
having fun
Dan Finlay: meme token experiment , tools & incentives not currently sufficient for fundraising or
â€¢ Kraken NFT marketplace closing , users have 3 months to withdraw NFTs
Kraken NFT marketplace closing , users have 3 months to withdraw NFTs
â€¢ Freysa : player successfully convinced AI agent to transfer prize pool
Freysa : player successfully convinced AI agent to transfer prize pool
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ US Fifth Circuit rules Tornado Cash immutable contracts canâ€™t be sanctioned under current law, OFAC
overstepped
US Fifth Circuit rules Tornado Cash immutable contracts canâ€™t be sanctioned under current law, OFAC
â€¢ Coinbase USDC Rewards sunset in Europe due to MiCA regulation
Coinbase USDC Rewards sunset in Europe due to MiCA regulation
General
â€¢ EF Poseidon cryptanalysis initiative : attack bounties & research grants
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
